agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Transportation SUBCOMMITTEE: Tolling TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Wednesday, April 17, 2019 PLACE: E2.030 CHAIR: Rep. Brooks Landgraf *Public testimony may be limited to two (2) minutes.* If submitting written documentation, please provide 15 copies (with your name on each) to the committee clerk before or during the hearing. HB 436 Shaheen Relating to the cessation of tolls by toll project entities in certain circumstances. HB 1951 Krause | et al. Relating to the development, construction, and operation of toll projects; authorizing an administrative fee; imposing a civil penalty. HB 2781 Middleton Relating to the cessation of tolls on state highway segments in certain counties. HB 4398 Raney Relating to the electronic transmission of an invoice or notice of toll nonpayment by a toll project entity. Bills deleted after last posting: HB 891 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
